title: Katerina Bischel
text:
My Profile
Hello everyone, I a graduating Environmental Studies B.A. major at UCSB. I am working on a masters degree at Bren School of Environmental Science and Management Fall 2024 - Spring 2026. This website showcases my senior thesis: Remediating Ocean Acidification: Using Calcium Carbonate from Discarded Bivalves to Enhance Ocean Alkalinity
